abstract: Anheuser-Busch InBev will take a controlling stake in the Caribbean drinks maker Cerveceria Nacional Dominicana through two deals. The acquisition will strengthen Anheuser-Busch InBev’s presence across the Caribbean.
snippet: Anheuser-Busch InBev will take a controlling stake in the Caribbean drinks maker Cerveceria Nacional Dominicana through two deals. The acquisition will strengthen Anheuser-Busch InBev’s presence across the Caribbean.
lead_paragraph: Anheuser-Busch InBev, the world’s largest brewer, agreed on Monday to take a controlling stake in the Caribbean drinks maker Cerveceria Nacional Dominicana, or C.N.D., for $1.2 billion.

headline.main: Anheuser-Busch InBev to Take Controlling Stake in Caribbean Brewer
